Articles.Content:
A strange bug with the LFB KR-1x2 engine is causing every part connected to it to misteriously dissasemble when the engine is ejected using a radial decoupler.

At first I thoug it was a problem with the separator applying too much force to it, but when I used sepatrons attached to it and saw them flying away from the engine the time I staged, I found it was a much more disturbing problem...

Edited September 23, 2014 by luizopiloto

I have the same problem, anything mounted to a radial decoupler (small or large decoupler) disassembles when it separates.

It looks like this bug is confirmed and high-priority over on the bug tracker:

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/2842

while they don't resolve this issue, This is the solution I've found:

Radial Linear Decoupler...
